job_history.work_description: Currently the on-site Project Accountant for the Gulfport High School renovation which is a CM project with direct owner purchase. Proficient with AS400, SAP and JD Edwards accounting systems and all Microsoft applications as well as Construction Imaging software for invoice coding and Bluebeam. Previously managed the preparation, distribution and tracking of subcontracts, purchase orders, service agreements, change orders, insurance and bonds for multiple projects.

Developed and implemented a procedure manual for subcontractors that included RFI's, Submittals, and Change Order Proposals and also developed a companion manual for Project Management. Successfully coordinated and produced a project overview presentation for the Mirage monthly executive meeting. Assisted in the development and maintenance of a database to track contracts and change orders in excess of $700 million.

Acquired and maintained all necessary licenses, permits and insurances to operate and perform construction work. Managed all insurance, premiums, claims and annual audits. Scheduled equipment, ordered materials, verified, coded and paid vendor invoices and prepared AIA requisitions for owner billings.

Maintained all property management and lease administration for a phased, 24-acre business park known as Hampton Business Center located in Capitol Heights, MD and negotiated contracts for new construction, site development and maintenance. Prepared budgets for 300,000 + square feet of warehouse space for 10 and 20 year lease options that included property taxes, insurance and a detailed electrical/HVAC maintenance program for the GSA/Smithsonian.

Responsible for interior tenant build out for various projects to include the design phase with the utility providers, city engineers and trade contractors to determine correct loads depending on the tenant's needs. Monitored and coordinated daily construction activities and immediately addressed any outstanding issues to maintain strict schedule deadlines.

Designed, implemented and maintained a company reference manual for each project which detailed construction progress as it related to scheduling tenants and lease negotiations. Managed interior build out of Northern Virginia projects to include pre-construction evaluation and overall coordination of trades through the punch list.

Provided clerical support, researched claims, prepared meeting minutes and performed all other necessary duties as directed. Provided clerical support, issued purchase orders and maintained certified payroll while working on the job site at the CIA Headquarters (Langley, VA) for the CIA powerhouse modifications project.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in managing projects, including construction projects, and has held various roles such as Project Manager, Assistant Project Manager, and Project Coordinator, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Construction Management
skills.explanation: Has managed construction projects, including interior tenant build-outs, and has experience with construction imaging software, Bluebeam, and other construction-related tools, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Has experience with various accounting systems, including AS400, SAP, and JD Edwards, and has managed financial records, invoices, and payments, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Microsoft Applications
skills.explanation: Has experience with all Microsoft applications, including Excel, Word, and PowerPoint, and has used them for managing financial records, preparing presentations, and performing other tasks, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Contract Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with managing contracts, including subcontractors, purchase orders, and service agreements, and has developed procedures for contract management, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Has experience with preparing budgets for large projects, including property taxes, insurance, and maintenance programs, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience with managing teams, including project teams, and has held leadership roles, including Owner and Project Manager, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Database Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with developing and maintaining databases to track contracts and change orders, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Graphic Design
skills.explanation: Has a degree in Graphic Design, but there is no direct experience mentioned in the work history, suggesting some practical experience.

skills.name: Real Estate
skills.explanation: Has a degree in Real Estate, but there is no direct experience mentioned in the work history, suggesting some practical experience.

skills.name: Architectural Drafting
skills.explanation: Has a certificate in Architectural Drafting, but there is no direct experience mentioned in the work history, suggesting some practical experience.
